channel.title: How to make Leftclickable Client? NEED HELP PLEASE
channel.description: When im playing on my server and i want to do something i click with the left mouse button but on this server the left mouse button is like the right...-----> if i click on d claws with left button the d claws inteface comes out with wield examine etc. HOW CAN I DO THAT LEFT MOUSE BUTTON WORKS ON THE CLIENT????? :confused: :confused: NEED HELP LEASE
